title: Is there a way for me to change my e-mail without the password?
body:
I went to eat lunch and came back to my computer and it says I logged in from another computer.  I signed onto my other account and then got unfriended immediately.  I tried to log in but my password had changed so I requested a password reset.  Then I noticed the e-mail had changed.  Oddly I was still logged on here so I haven't been asked for a new password as of yet, but there's someone out there with my account and wondering if there's an easy solution I'm overlooking.  Thanks!

I'll try not to close this browser, but I may lose access if something happens.  Thanks

replies.body: If someone else has logged in or accessed your account, please [send us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) immediately!  Once we confirm ownership, we'll be able to get you back into the game in no time :)
Send a ticket to Riot  and they will ask for account info like, first champ bought. first location logged in and shit like that

Thank you.  I did that.  I was just wondering if there was some system workaround to resolve it on my own since I wasn't sure how long that wait would be if ever.  Apparently I'm twitch banned as well with 3 warnings despite not logging onto Twitch in ages.  Hopefully Riot staff can get to me soon.  Wish there was a contact number.  Took 20 minutes to fix my Blizzard account.
